subject: Horse Racing
lead_paragraph: Adriano, an A.P. Indy colt trained by Graham Motion, raced to the biggest victory of his career by winning the $500,000 Lane’s End Stakes on the synthetic surface at Turfway Park in Florence, Ky., after taking control at the top of the stretch.Motion has said that racing Adriano in the Kentucky Derby, on Churchill Downs’s traditional dirt surface, was unlikely. “But never say never,” he said.
